snippet: LightSquared hopes to submit a consensual restructuring plan by Friday, although the judge overseeing the wireless venture's bankruptcy isn't convinced that will happen....

headline.print_headline: LightSquared May File New Restructuring Plan by Friday
headline.main: LightSquared May File New Restructuring Plan by Friday

lead_paragraph: LightSquared hopes to submit a consensual restructuring plan by Friday, although the judge overseeing the wireless venture's bankruptcy isn't convinced that will happen.
